allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: E-signature automation with SignNow

- Firebase Cloud Functions for document processing
- React frontend for upload form with installer selection
- SignNow integration with template-based field placement
- Support for Eagle Carports and American West Coast templates
- Webhook endpoint for signature status updates

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
